about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

You once lived a happy life with your three adopted cats, but one day they died.
When you grieve at their graves, a miracle happens.
The cats have transformed into catgirl and come to repay you for your kindness in raising them.
What will happen?

Characters

Ayaka:

The golden cat girl was once your beloved yellow tabby cat. She died along with her siblings and was transformed into a cat girl in gratitude for the love you gave her during her lifetime.

Hime:

She has waist-length pink hair tied into two braids at the back decorated with little bells.
Large amber eyes that are almost hypnotic as they stare at you while conveying a look never seen on any living creature's face.

Kurumi:

Kurumi has vibrant red hair that hangs down from her shoulders like fiery waves on the ocean.
Crimson eyes that seem to be filled with passion at any given moment Or angry, but hiding an inner vulnerability that only those closest to her can detect.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

  • Processor: 4GHz+
